ResourceHeader.AlternateName: Automatic Space Plasma Experiment with Rotating Analyzer
ResourceHeader.Description:
The plasma analyzer comprises two spectrometer systems, namely, the electron spectrometer
        and the ion mass spectrometer, with a 360 field-of-view lying in the plane perpendicular to
        the plane of rotation

Instrument.InvestigationName: Automatic Space Plasma Experiment with Rotating Analyzer on Phobos2
